name: Tagetes
description:
Tagetes is a game about exploring old ruins to collect magical flowers. You play as Scratch, an archaeologist researching a rare type of marigold flowers called tagetes. The ruins however hold several challenges that Scratch must overcome in order to collect all 10 of the mysterious flowers.

The player uses the WASD keys and the mouse to look and move around, in addition the player can press the left shift button while walking to run and move more quickly through the level. There are several things the player can interact with, including picking up flowers, opening some doors, turning the obelisks of a puzzle and activating portals.
